# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-104">Definizioni delle entità tipo di informazioni sensibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-108">Numero di routing ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-109">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-110">nove cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-111">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-112">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-112">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-113">quattro cifre che iniziano con 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 o 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-113">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-114">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-114">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-115">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-116">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-117">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-117">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-118">Non formattato: nove cifre consecutive che iniziano con 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 o 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-118">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-119">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-120">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-120">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-121">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-122">Un criterio ha una probabilità media di rilevamento di questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-122">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-123">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-123">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-124">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ABA_Routing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-124">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-125">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-125">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-126">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-126">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-144">Numero DNI (Argentina National Identity)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-144">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-145">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-146">Otto cifre con o senza punti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-146">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-147">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-148">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-148">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-149">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-149">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-150">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-150">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-151">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-152">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-152">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-153">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-153">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-154">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-155">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-155">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-156">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-157">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-158">L'espressione regolare Regex_argentina_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-158">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-159">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_argentina_national_id dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-159">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-171">Codice identificativo fiscale univoco argentina (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-171">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-172">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-173">Undici cifre con trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-173">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-174">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-175">Undici cifre con un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-175">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-176">due cifre in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 o 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-176">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-177">un trattino (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-177">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-178">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-179">un trattino (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-179">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-180">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-180">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-181">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-182">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-183">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-184">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-184">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-185">La funzione `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-185">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-186">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-186">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-187">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-187">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-188">La funzione `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-188">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-227">Numero di conto corrente bancario Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-227">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-228">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-228">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-229">da sei a dieci cifre con o senza un numero di filiale dello stato della banca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-229">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-230">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-230">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-231">Il numero di account è da 6 a 10 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-231">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-232">Numero BSB australiano:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-232">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-233">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-234">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-234">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-235">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-235">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-236">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-237">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-238">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-239">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-239">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-240">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-240">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-241">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-241">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-242">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-242">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-243">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-243">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-244">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-244">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-245">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-245">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-329">Numero di patente australiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-329">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-330">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-331">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-331">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-332">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-333">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-333">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-334">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-334">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-335">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-335">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-336">cinque cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-336">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-337">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-337">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-338">da una a due lettere facoltative (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-338">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-339">da quattro a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-339">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-340">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-340">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-341">nove cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-341">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-342">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-343">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-344">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-345">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-345">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-346">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-346">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-347">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-347">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-348">Non vengono trovate parole chiava da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-348">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-448">Numero di conto medico Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-448">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-449">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-449">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-450">10-11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-450">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-451">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-451">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-452">10-11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-452">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-453">La prima cifra è compresa nell'intervallo 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-453">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-454">Nove cifre è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-454">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-455">La decima cifra è la cifra del problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-455">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-456">L'undicesima cifra (facoltativa) è il numero singolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-456">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-457">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-458">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-458">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-459">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-460">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-461">La funzione Func_australian_medical_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-461">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-462">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-462">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-463">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-463">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-475">Numero di passaporto australiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-475">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-476">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-477">Una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-477">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-478">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-479">Una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-479">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-480">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-481">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-482">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-483">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-484">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_passport_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-484">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-485">Viene trovata una Keyword_passport o Keyword_australia_passport_number parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-485">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-519">Numero di file fiscale australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-519">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-520">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-520">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-521">da otto a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-521">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-522">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-522">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-523">da otto a nove cifre in genere presentate con spazi come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-523">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-524">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-524">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-525">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-525">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-526">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-526">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-527">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-527">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-528">da due a tre cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-528">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-529">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-530">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-531">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-532">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-533">La funzione Func_australian_tax_file_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-533">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-534">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number o da Keyword_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-534">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-535">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-547">Austria - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-547">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-548">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-549">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-549">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-550">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-551">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-551">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-552">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-552">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-553">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-553">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-554">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-554">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-555">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-555">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-556">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-556">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-557">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-557">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-684">Carta d'identità Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-684">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-685">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-685">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-686">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-686">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-687">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-687">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-688">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-688">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-689">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-689">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-690">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-690">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-691">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-691">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-692">Una combinazione di 24 caratteri di lettere, cifre e caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-692">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-693">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-693">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-694">24 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-694">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="2f639-695">22 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre o segni più</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-695">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-696">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre, segni più o segni di uguale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-696">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-697">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-698">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-698">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-699">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-700">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-700">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-701">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-701">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-702">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-702">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-707">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-707">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-708">Numero di passaporto austriano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-708">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-709">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-710">Una lettera seguita da uno spazio facoltativo e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-710">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-711">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-712">Combinazione di una lettera, sette cifre e uno spazio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-712">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-713">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-713">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-714">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-714">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-715">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-715">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-716">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-717">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-717">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-718">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-719">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-719">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-720">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-720">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-721">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-721">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-722">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-722">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-723">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-723">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-724">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-724">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-725">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-725">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-749">Austria - Numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-749">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-750">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-751">10 cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-751">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-752">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-753">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-753">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-754">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-754">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-755">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-755">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-756">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-756">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-757">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-758">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-759">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-760">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-760">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-761">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-761">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-762">viene trovata una  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` parola chiave da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-762">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-763">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-763">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-764">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-764">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-784">sozialesicherheitkein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-784">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-790">Numero di identificazione fiscale Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-790">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-791">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-792">nove cifre con trattino facoltativo e barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-792">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-793">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-794">nove cifre con trattino facoltativo e barra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-794">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-795">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-795">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-796">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-796">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-797">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-797">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-798">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-798">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-799">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-799">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-800">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-801">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-801">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-802">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-803">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-803">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-804">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-804">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-805">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-805">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-806">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-807">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-807">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-808">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-808">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-809">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-809">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-810">österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-810">österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-830">Imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-830">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-831">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-832">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-833">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-834">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-835">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-836">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-837">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-838">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-838">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-839">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-840">Motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-840">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-841">A o a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-841">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-842">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-842">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-843">Spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-843">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-844">U o u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-844">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-845">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-845">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-846">due o tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-846">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-847">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-847">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-848">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-848">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-849">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-849">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-850">una o due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-850">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-851">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-852">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-853">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-854">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-855">La funzione Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-855">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-856">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-856">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-857">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-858">La funzione Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-858">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-876">Chiave di autenticazione di Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-876">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-877">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-878">La stringa "DocumentDb" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-878">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-879">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-879">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-880">Stringa "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-880">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-881">Qualsiasi combinazione di 3-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-881">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-882">Un simbolo di maggiore di (>), un segno di uguale (=), una virgoletta (") o un apostrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-882">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-883">Qualsiasi combinazione di 86 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-883">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-884">Due segni di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-884">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-885">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-886">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-887">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-888">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-888">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-889">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-890">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-890">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-891">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-891">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-896">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-896">northwind</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-905">Stringa di connessione del database IAAS di Azure e stringa di connessione SQL azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-905">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-906">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-907">Stringa "Server", "server" o "origine dati" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente, inclusa la stringa "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-907">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f639-908">com" o "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-908">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f639-909">net" o "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-909">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f639-910">net" e la stringa "Password" o "password" o "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-910">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-911">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-911">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-912">la stringa "Server", "server" o "origine dati"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-912">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-913">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-914">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-914">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-915">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-915">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-916">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-916">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-917">Stringa "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-917">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f639-918">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-918">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f639-919">net" o "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-919">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f639-920">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-920">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-921">qualsiasi combinazione tra 1 e 300 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-921">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-922">la stringa "Password", "password" o "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-922">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-923">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-923">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-924">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-924">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-925">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-925">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-926">uno o più caratteri che non sono un punto e virgola (;), virgolette (") o apostrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-926">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-927">un punto e virgola (;), virgolette (") o apostrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-927">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-928">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-928">Checksum</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1048">Firma di accesso condiviso di Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1048">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1049">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1050">La stringa "sig" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe delineati nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1050">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1051">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1051">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1052">la stringa "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1052">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1053">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1053">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1054">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1054">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1055">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1055">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1056">qualsiasi combinazione di caratteri compresi tra 43 e 53 caratteri che siano lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre o il segno di percentuale (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1056">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1057">stringa "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1057">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1058">qualsiasi carattere che non sia una lettera minuscola o maiuscola, una cifra o un segno di percentuale (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1058">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1059">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1060">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1060">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1061">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1062">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1062">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1063">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureSAS trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1063">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1064">Stringa di connessione del bus di servizio di Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1064">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1065">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1066">La stringa "EndPoint" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente, incluse le stringhe "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1066">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1067">net" e "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1067">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1068">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1068">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1069">la stringa "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1069">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1070">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1070">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1071">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1071">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1072">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1072">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1073">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1073">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1074">la stringa "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1074">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1075">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1075">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1076">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1076">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1077">la stringa "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1077">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1078">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1078">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1079">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1079">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1080">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1080">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1081">qualsiasi combinazione di 43 caratteri minuscoli o maiuscoli, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1081">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1082">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1082">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1083">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1084">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1084">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1085">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1086">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1087">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1087">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1088">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1088">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
