## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1103">Chiave dell'account di archiviazione di Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1103">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1104">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1105">Stringa "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente, inclusa la stringa "AccountKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1105">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1106">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1106">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1107">la stringa "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1107">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1108">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1108">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1109">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1109">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1110">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1110">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1111">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1111">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1112">la stringa "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1112">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1113">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1113">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1114">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1114">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1115">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1115">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1116">qualsiasi combinazione di 86 caratteri minuscoli o maiuscoli, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1116">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1117">due segni di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1117">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1118">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1119">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1119">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1120">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1121">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1122">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1122">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1123">L'espressione CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1123">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1124">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1124">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1142">Archiviazione di Azure account utente (generica)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1142">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1143">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1144">Qualsiasi combinazione di 86 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+), preceduta o seguita dai caratteri indicati nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1144">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1145">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1145">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1146">da zero a uno dei simboli di maggiore di (>), apostrofo ('), segno di uguale (=), virgolette (") o simbolo di numero (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1146">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1147">qualsiasi combinazione di 86 caratteri minuscoli o maiuscoli, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1147">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1148">due segni di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1148">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1149">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1150">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1151">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1152">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1153">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1153">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1154">Numero di patente di guida belgio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1154">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1155">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1156">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1156">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1157">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1158">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1158">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1159">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1160">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1160">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1161">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1162">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1162">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1163">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1163">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1164">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1164">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1297">Belgio - Numero nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1297">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1298">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1298">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1299">11 cifre più delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1299">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1300">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1300">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1301">11 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1301">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1302">sei cifre e due punti facoltativi nel formato AA. MM.DD per la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1302">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1303">Delimitatore facoltativo da punto, trattino, spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1303">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1304">tre cifre sequenziali (dispari per i maschi, anche per le femmine)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1304">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1305">Delimitatore facoltativo da punto, trattino, spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1305">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1306">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1306">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1307">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1308">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1308">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1309">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1310">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1310">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1311">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1311">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1312">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_belgium_national_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1312">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1313">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1313">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1314">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1314">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1315">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1315">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1316">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1375">Belgio - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1375">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1376">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1377">due lettere seguite da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1377">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1378">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1379">due lettere e seguito da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1379">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1381">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1381">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1382">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1382">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1383">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1384">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1384">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1385">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1386">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave da o viene `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1386">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1387">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1388">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1388">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1389">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1416">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto del Belgio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1416">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1417">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1417">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1418">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1418">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1419">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1419">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1420">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1420">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1421">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1421">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1422">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1422">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1423">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1424">Motivo alfanumerico a 12 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1424">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1425">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1426">Motivo alfanumerico a 12 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1426">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1427">una lettera B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1427">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1428">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1428">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1429">una cifra 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1429">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1430">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1430">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1431">un punto facoltativo o un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1431">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1432">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1432">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1433">un punto facoltativo o un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1433">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1434">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1434">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1435">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1436">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1436">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1437">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1438">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1438">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1439">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1439">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1440">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1440">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1441">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1441">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1442">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1442">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1449">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1449">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1450">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1450">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1454">Brasile - Numero CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1454">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1455">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1456">11 cifre che includono una cifra di controllo e possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1456">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1457">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1458">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1458">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1459">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1459">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1460">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1460">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1461">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1461">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1462">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1462">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1463">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1463">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1464">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1464">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1465">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1465">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1466">Non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1466">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1467">11 cifre dove le ultime due sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1467">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1468">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1469">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1469">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1470">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1471">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1471">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1472">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1472">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1473">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_brazil_cpf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1473">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1474">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1475">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1476">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1476">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1477">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1477">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1489">Numero della persona giuridica del Brasile (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1489">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1490">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1491">14 cifre che includono il numero di registrazione, il codice della filiale, le cifre di controllo e i delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1491">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1492">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1493">14 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1493">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1494">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1494">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1495">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1495">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1496">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1496">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1497">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1497">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1498">tre cifre (queste prime otto cifre sono il numero di registrazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1498">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1499">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1499">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1500">Numero di ramo a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1500">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1501">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1501">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1502">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1502">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1503">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1504">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1504">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1505">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1506">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1506">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1507">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1507">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1508">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_brazil_cnpj da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1508">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1509">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1509">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1510">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1511">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1511">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1512">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1534">Carta di identità nazionale (RG) del Brasile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1534">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1535">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1536">Registro Geral (formato precedente): nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1536">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato): 11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1538">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1539">Registro Geral (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1539">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1540">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1540">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1541">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1541">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1542">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1542">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1543">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1543">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1544">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1544">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1545">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1545">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1546">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1546">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1548">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1548">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1549">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1549">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1550">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1550">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1551">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1552">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1553">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1554">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1554">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1555">La funzione Func_brazil_rg trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1555">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1556">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_brazil_rg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1556">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1557">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1557">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1568">Numero di patente di guida bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1568">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1569">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1570">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1570">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1571">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1571">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1572">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1572">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1573">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1574">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1574">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1575">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1576">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1576">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1577">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1577">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1578">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1578">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1705">Numero civile uniforme Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1705">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1706">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1706">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1707">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1707">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1708">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1708">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1709">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1709">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1710">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1710">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1711">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1711">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1712">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1713">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1713">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1714">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1715">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1715">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1716">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1716">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1717">due cifre che corrispondono all'ordine di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1717">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1718">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso: una cifra pari per il maschio e una cifra dispari per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1718">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1719">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1719">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1720">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1721">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1721">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1722">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1723">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1723">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1724">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1724">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1725">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1725">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1726">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1726">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1727">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1727">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1729">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1729">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1730">bnn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1730">bnn#</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1772">Numero di passaporto bulgaro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1772">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1773">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1774">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1774">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1775">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1776">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1776">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1777">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1778">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1778">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1779">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1780">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1780">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1781">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1781">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1782">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1782">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1783">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1783">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1784">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1785">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1785">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1786">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1786">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1806">Canada - Numero di conto corrente bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1806">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1807">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1807">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1808">7 o 12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1808">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1809">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1809">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1810">Un numero di conto corrente bancario canadese è di 7 o 12 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1810">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1811">Un numero di transito bancario canadese comprende:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1811">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1812">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1812">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1813">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1813">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1814">tre cifre OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1814">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1815">zero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1815">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1816">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1816">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1817">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1818">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1819">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1820">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1820">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1821">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1821">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1822">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1822">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1823">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1823">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1824">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1825">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1825">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1826">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1826">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1850">Canada - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1850">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1851">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1852">Varia in base alla provincia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1852">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1853">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1853">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1854">Vari modelli per Alberta, Columbia Britannica, Manitoba, Nuovo Brunswick, Terranova e Labrador, Nuova Scozia, Ontario, Isola del Principe Edoardo, Quebec e Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1854">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1855">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1856">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1856">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1857">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-1858">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1859">La funzione Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1859">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1860">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1860">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1861">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1861">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1997">Numero del servizio sanitario canadese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1997">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-1998">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1998">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2f639-1999">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2000">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2001">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2001">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2002">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2003">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2003">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2004">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2005">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2005">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2006">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_health_service_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2006">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2007">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_health_service_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2007">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2019">Numero di passaporto canadese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2019">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2020">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2021">due lettere maiuscole seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2022">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2022">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2023">due lettere maiuscole seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2023">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2024">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2024">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2025">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2026">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2026">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2027">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2027">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2028">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_passport_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2028">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2029">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_canada_passport_number o Keyword_passport viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2029">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2059">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2059">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2060">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2060">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2061">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2062">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2062">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2063">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2063">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2064">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2065">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2065">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2066">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2067">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2067">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2068">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_phin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2068">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2069">Vengono trovate almeno due parole Keyword_canada_phin o Keyword_canada_provinces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2069">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2102">Canada - Numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2102">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2103">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2104">nove cifre con trattini o spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2104">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2105">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2106">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2106">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2107">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2108">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2109">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2109">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2110">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2110">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2111">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2111">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2112">Non formattato: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2112">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2113">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2114">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2115">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2116">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2116">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2117">La funzione Func_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2117">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2118">Almeno due delle seguenti combinazioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2118">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2119">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2119">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2120">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2120">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2121">La funzione Func_eu_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2121">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2122">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2123">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2123">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2124">La funzione Func_unformatted_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2124">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2125">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2125">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2126">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2126">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
