## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2151">Numero di carta di identità cileno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2151">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2152">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2153">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori una cifra di controllo o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2154">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2155">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2155">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2156">da una a due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2156">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2157">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2158">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2159">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2159">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2160">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2160">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2161">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2161">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2162">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2162">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2163">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2164">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2165">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2166">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2166">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2167">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2167">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2168">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_chile_id_card parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2168">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2169">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2170">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2170">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2171">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2171">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2172">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2209">Numero di carta d'identità (PRC) residente in Cina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2209">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2210">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2211">18 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2211">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2212">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2213">18 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2213">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2214">sei cifre che sono un codice indirizzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2214">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2215">otto cifre nel formato AAAAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2215">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2216">tre cifre che sono un codice d'ordine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2216">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2217">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2217">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2218">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2219">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2219">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2220">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2221">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2221">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2222">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2222">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2223">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_china_resident_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2223">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2224">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2225">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2225">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2226">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2226">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2227">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2227">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2240">Numero di carta di credito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2240">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2241">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2242">Da 14 a 16 cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate (dddddddd) e che devono superare il test Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2242">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2243">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2244">Modello complesso e affidabile che rileva le carte di tutte le principali marche in tutto il mondo, tra cui Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, carte regalo e carte da pranzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2244">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2245">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2246">Yes, il checksum Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2246">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2247">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2248">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2249">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2249">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2250">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2250">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2251">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_verification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2251">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2252">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2252">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2253">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2253">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2254">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2254">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2255">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2255">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2256">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2256">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2257">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2257">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2517">Croatia driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2517">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2518">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2519">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2519">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2520">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2521">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2521">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2522">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2523">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2524">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2525">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2526">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2526">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2527">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2527">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2651">Numero di carta d'identità della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2651">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2652">Questa entità del tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2652">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2653">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2653">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2654">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2655">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2655">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2656">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2657">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2657">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2658">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2659">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2660">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2661">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2662">La funzione Func_croatia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2662">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2663">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_croatia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2663">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2694">Numero di passaporto croato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2694">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2695">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2696">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2696">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2697">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2698">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2698">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2699">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2700">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2700">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2701">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2702">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2702">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2703">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2703">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2704">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2704">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2705">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2705">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2706">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2706">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2707">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2707">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2708">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2709">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2709">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2710">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2710">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2711">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2711">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2726">Numero di identificazione personale (OIB) della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2726">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2727">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2728">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2728">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2729">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2730">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2730">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2731">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2731">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2732">la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2732">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2733">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2734">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2734">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2735">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2736">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2736">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2737">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2737">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2738">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2738">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2739">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2740">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2740">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2741">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2741">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2742">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2742">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2773">Numero di licenza per i driver di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2773">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2774">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2775">12 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2775">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2776">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2777">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2777">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2778">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2779">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2779">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2780">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2781">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2782">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2782">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2783">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2783">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2908">Carta d'identità di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2908">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2909">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2909">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2910">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2910">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2911">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2911">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2912">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2912">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2913">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2913">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2914">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2914">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2915">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2916">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2916">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2917">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2918">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2918">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2919">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2920">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2920">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2921">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2922">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2922">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2923">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2923">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2924">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2924">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2925">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2925">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2926">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2926">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2927">id numero di carta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2927">id card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2929">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2929">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2930">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2930">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2933">Numero di passaporto di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2933">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2934">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2935">una lettera seguita da 6-8 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2935">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2936">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2937">una lettera seguita da sei a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2937">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2938">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2939">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2939">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2940">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2941">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2942">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2942">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2943">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2944">L'espressione `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG/MM/AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2944">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2945">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2945">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2946">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2946">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2947">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2948">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2948">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2949">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2949">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2950">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2950">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2976">Codice fiscale di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2976">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2977">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2977">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2978">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2978">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2979">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2979">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2980">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2980">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2981">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2981">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2982">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2982">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2983">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2984">otto cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2984">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2985">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2986">otto cifre e una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2986">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2987">a "0" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2987">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2988">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2988">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2989">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2989">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2990">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2991">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2991">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-2992">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2993">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2993">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2994">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2994">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2995">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2995">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-2996">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2996">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-2997">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-2997">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3025">Numero di patente di guida ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3025">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3026">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3027">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3027">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3028">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3029">otto lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3029">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3030">lettera "E" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3030">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3031">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3031">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3032">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3032">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3033">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3033">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3034">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3035">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3035">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3036">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3037">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3037">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3038">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3038">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3039">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3039">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3165">Numero di passaporto ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3165">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3166">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3167">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3168">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3169">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3169">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3170">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3171">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3171">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3172">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3173">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3173">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3174">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3174">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3175">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3175">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3176">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3176">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3177">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3177">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3178">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3178">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3179">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3179">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3201">Numero di identità personale ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3201">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3202">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3203">nove cifre con barra facoltativa (formato precedente) 10 cifre con barra facoltativa (nuovo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3203">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3204">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3205">nove cifre (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3205">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3206">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3206">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3207">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3207">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3208">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3208">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3209">10 cifre (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3209">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3210">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3210">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3211">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3211">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3212">quattro cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3212">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3213">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3214">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3215">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3216">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3216">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3217">La funzione Func_czech_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3217">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3218">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_czech_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3218">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3219">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3220">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3220">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3221">La funzione Func_czech_id_card_new_format trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3221">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3222">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3269">Numero di patente di guida danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3269">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3270">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3271">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3271">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3272">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3273">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3273">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3274">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3275">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3275">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3276">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3277">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3277">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3278">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3278">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3279">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3279">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3403">Numero di passaporto danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3403">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3404">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3405">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3405">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3406">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3407">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3407">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3408">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3409">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3409">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3410">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3411">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3412">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3412">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3413">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3414">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3415">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3416">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3416">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3417">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3437">Numero di identificazione personale Danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3437">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3438">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3439">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3439">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3440">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3441">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3441">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3442">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3442">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3443">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3443">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3444">quattro cifre in cui la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3444">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3445">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3446">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3447">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3448">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3448">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3449">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3449">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3450">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_denmark_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3450">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3451">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3452">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3452">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3453">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3453">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3454">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3454">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3526">Numero dea (Drug Enforcement Agency)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3526">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3527">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3528">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3528">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3529">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3530">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3530">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3531">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) da questo set di lettere possibili: abcdefghjklmnprstux, che è un codice registrante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3531">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3532">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), ovvero la prima lettera del cognome o della cifra "9" del dichiarante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3532">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3533">sette cifre, l'ultima delle quali è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3533">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3534">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3535">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3535">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3536">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3537">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3537">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3538">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3538">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3539">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_dea_number` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3539">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3540">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3541">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3541">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3542">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3542">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3543">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3550">Numero di patente di guida estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3550">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3551">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3552">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3552">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3553">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3554">due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3554">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3555">le lettere "ET" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3555">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3556">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3556">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3557">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3558">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3558">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3559">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3560">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3561">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3561">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3562">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
