## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3688">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3688">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3689">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3690">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3691">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3692">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3693">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3694">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3695">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3696">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3696">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3697">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3698">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3699">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita (numero dispari maschile, numero pari femminile; 1-2: 19° secolo; 3-4: 20° secolo; 5-6: 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3699">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3700">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3700">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3701">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale che separa le persone nate nella stessa data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3701">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3702">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3702">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3703">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3704">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3705">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3706">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3707">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3707">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3708">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3708">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3709">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3710">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3710">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3743">Numero di passaporto estone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3743">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3744">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3745">una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3745">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3746">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3747">una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3747">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3748">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3749">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3750">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3751">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3752">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3752">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3753">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3754">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3755">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3756">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3756">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3757">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3775">Numero di carta di debito dell'Unione europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3775">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3776">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3777">16 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3777">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3778">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3779">Modello complesso e affidabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3779">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3780">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3781">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3781">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-3782">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-3783">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3783">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3784">La funzione Func_eu_debit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3784">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3785">Si verifica almeno una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3785">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3786">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_eu_debit_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3786">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3787">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3788">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_security_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3788">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3789">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3789">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3790">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3790">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-3791">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-3791">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4238">Numero di patente di guida finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4238">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4239">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4240">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4241">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4242">10 cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4242">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4243">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4243">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4244">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4244">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4245">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4245">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4246">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4246">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4247">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4248">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4249">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4250">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4251">L'espressione  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4251">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4252">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4383">Finlandia - Numero di assicurazione sanitaria europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4383">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4384">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4384">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4385">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4385">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4386">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4386">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4387">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4387">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4388">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4388">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4389">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4389">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4390">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4390">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4391">Numero a 20 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4391">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4392">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4392">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4393">Numero a 20 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4393">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4394">10 cifre - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4394">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4395">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4395">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4396">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4396">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4397">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4397">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4398">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4398">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4399">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4399">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4400">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4400">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4401">L'espressione Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4401">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4402">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4402">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4420">Id nazionale Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4420">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4421">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4422">sei cifre più un carattere che indica un secolo più tre cifre più una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4422">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4423">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4424">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4424">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4425">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, che sono una data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4425">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4426">indicatore del secolo ('-', '+' o 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4426">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4427">Numero di identificazione personale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4427">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4428">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4428">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4429">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4430">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4430">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4431">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4432">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4432">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4433">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4433">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4434">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_finnish_national_id viene trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4434">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4435">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4435">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4436">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4437">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4437">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4438">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4438">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4487">Numero di passaporto finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4487">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4488">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4488">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4489">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4489">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4490">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4490">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4491">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4491">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4492">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4492">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4493">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4493">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4494">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4494">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4495">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4496">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4496">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4497">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4498">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4498">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4499">L'espressione `Regex_finland_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4499">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4500">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_finland_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4500">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4501">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4501">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4502">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4502">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4503">L'espressione `Regex_finland_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4503">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4504">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_finland_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4504">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4528">Francia - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4528">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4529">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4529">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4530">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4531">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4531">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4532">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4533">12 cifre con convalida per scontare modelli analoghi, ad esempio, quello dei numeri telefonici francesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4533">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4534">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4535">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4535">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4536">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4537">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4537">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4538">la funzione Func_french_drivers_license trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4538">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4539">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_french_drivers_license ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4539">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4666">Numero dell'assicurazione sanitaria francese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4666">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4667">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4668">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4669">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4670">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4671">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4672">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4673">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4674">Numero a 21 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4674">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4675">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4675">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4676">Numero a 21 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4676">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4677">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4678">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4679">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4679">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4680">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4680">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4681">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4681">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4682">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4683">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4683">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4684">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4685">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4685">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4686">l'espressione Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4686">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4687">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4687">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4688">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4688">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4690">carta assicurativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4690">insurance card</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4693">Carta d'identità francese (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4693">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4694">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4695">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4696">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4697">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4697">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4698">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4699">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4699">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4700">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4701">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4701">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4702">L'espressione regolare Regex_france_cni restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4702">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4703">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4703">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4717">Francia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4717">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4718">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4718">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4719">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4719">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4720">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4721">nove cifre e lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4721">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4722">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4723">nove cifre e lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4723">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4724">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4724">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4725">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4725">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4726">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4726">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4727">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4728">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4728">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4729">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4730">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4730">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4731">La funzione `Func_fr_passport` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4731">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4732">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4732">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4733">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4733">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4734">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4734">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4735">La funzione `Func_fr_passport` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4735">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4736">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4736">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4767">Numero di previdenza sociale francia (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4767">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4768">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4769">15 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4769">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4770">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4771">Deve corrispondere a uno di questi due modelli:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4771">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4772">13 cifre seguite da uno spazio seguito da due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4772">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4773">oppure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4773">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4774">15 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4774">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4775">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4776">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4777">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4778">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4778">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4779">La funzione `Func_french_insee` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4779">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4780">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_fr_insee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4780">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4781">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4781">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4782">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4782">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4783">La funzione Func_french_insee o Func_fr_insee trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4783">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4784">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4784">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4785">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4785">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4787">code sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4787">code sécu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4788">d'identité nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4788">d'identité nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4789">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4789">insee</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4790">fssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4790">fssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4791">le numéro d'identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4791">le numéro d'identification nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4792">le code de la sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4792">le code de la sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4793">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4793">national id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4795">no d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4795">no d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-p133">

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4815">Numero di identificazione fiscale francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4815">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4816">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4817">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4817">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4818">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4819">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4819">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4820">Una cifra che deve essere 0, 1, 2 o 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4820">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4821">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4821">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4822">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4823">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4823">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4824">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4825">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4825">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4826">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4827">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4827">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4828">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4828">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4829">Tre cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4829">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4830">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4830">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4831">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4831">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4832">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4833">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4833">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4834">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4834">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4835">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4835">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4836">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4836">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4837">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4837">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4857">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto della Francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4857">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4858">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4858">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4859">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4859">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4860">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4860">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4862">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4862">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4863">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4863">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4864">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4865">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4866">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4867">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4867">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4868">due lettere - FR (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4868">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4869">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4869">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4870">due lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4870">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4871">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4872">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4873">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4874">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4874">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4875">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4875">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4876">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4876">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4877">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4877">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4878">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4878">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4879">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4879">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4880">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4880">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4881">La funzione Func_france_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4881">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4882">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4882">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4883">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4883">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4884">La funzione Func_france_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4884">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4897">Germania - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4897">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4898">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4898">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4899">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4899">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4900">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4901">combinazione di 11 cifre e lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4901">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4902">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4903">11 cifre e lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4903">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4904">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4904">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4905">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4905">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4906">sei cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4906">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4907">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4907">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4908">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4908">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4909">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4910">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-4911">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-4912">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4913">La funzione Func_german_drivers_license restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4913">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4914">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_german_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4914">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-4915">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-4915">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5064">Numero carta d'identità Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5064">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5065">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5066">dal 1° novembre 2010: nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5066">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5067">dal 1° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010: 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5067">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5068">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5069">dal 1° novembre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5069">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5070">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5070">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5071">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5071">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5072">dal 1° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5072">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5073">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5073">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5074">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5075">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5075">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5076">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5077">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5077">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5078">L'espressione regolare Regex_germany_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5078">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5079">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_germany_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5079">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5084">identificazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5084">identification</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5095">Germania - Numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5095">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5096">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate numero di passaporto UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5096">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5097">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5098">10 cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5098">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5099">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5100">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5100">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5101">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5101">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5102">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5102">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5103">cinque cifre o lettere di questo set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5103">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5104">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5104">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5105">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5106">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5107">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5108">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5108">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5109">La funzione Func_german_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5109">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5110">Viene trovata una `Keyword_german_passport` parola chiave da o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5110">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5111">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5111">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5112">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5113">La funzione Func_german_passport_data restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5113">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5114">Viene trovata una `Keyword_german_passport` parola chiave da o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5114">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5115">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5115">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
