## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5138">Numero di identificazione fiscale Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5138">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5139">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5140">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5140">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5141">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5142">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5142">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5143">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5143">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5144">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5145">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5145">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5146">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5147">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5147">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5148">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5148">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5149">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5149">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5150">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5150">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5151">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5152">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5153">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5154">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5155">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5155">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5156">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5156">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5157">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5184">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto della Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5184">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5185">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5185">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5186">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5186">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5187">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5187">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5188">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5188">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5189">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5189">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5190">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5190">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5191">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5192">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5192">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5193">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5194">Motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5194">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5195">una lettera D o d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5195">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5196">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5196">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5197">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5197">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5198">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5199">uno spazio facoltativo o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5200">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5200">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5201">uno spazio facoltativo o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5201">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5202">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5202">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5203">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5204">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5204">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5205">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5206">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5206">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5207">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5207">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5208">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5208">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5209">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5209">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5210">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5210">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5220">Numero di patente di guida in Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5220">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5221">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5221">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5222">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5223">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5223">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5224">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5225">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5225">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5226">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5227">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5228">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5229">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5229">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5230">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5230">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5231">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5231">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5357">Carta d'identità nazionale della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5357">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5358">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5359">Combinazione di 7-8 lettere e numeri, oltre a un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5359">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5360">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5361">Sette lettere e numeri (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5361">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5362">Una lettera (qualsiasi lettera dell'alfabeto greco) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5362">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5363">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5363">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5364">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5364">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5365">Otto lettere e numeri (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5365">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5366">Due lettere in maiuscolo sia in alfabeto latino che greco (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5366">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5367">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5367">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5368">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5368">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5369">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5370">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5370">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5371">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5372">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5372">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5373">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5373">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5374">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_greece_id_card'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5374">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5375">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5375">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5376">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5376">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5382">id polizia greco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5382">greek police id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5387">Numero di passaporto della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5387">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5388">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5389">Due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5389">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5390">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5391">Due lettere seguite da 7 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5391">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5392">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5393">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5393">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5394">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5395">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5395">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5396">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5396">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5397">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5397">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5398">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM AA (esempio - 28 agosto 19) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5398">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5399">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5399">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5400">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5400">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5401">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5418">Grecia - Numero di previdenza sociale (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5418">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5419">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5420">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5421">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5422">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5423">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5424">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5425">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5426">Undici cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5426">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5427">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5427">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5428">6 cifre come data di nascita AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5428">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5429">4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5429">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5430">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5430">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5431">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5432">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5432">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5433">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5434">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5434">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5435">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5435">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5436">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5436">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5437">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5438">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5438">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5450">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5450">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5451">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5451">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5457">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5457">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5459">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5459">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5461">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5461">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5462">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5463">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5464">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5464">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5465">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5465">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5494">Numero della carta di identità (HKID) di Hong Kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5494">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5495">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5496">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere e numeri. Facoltativamente, l’ultimo carattere può essere racchiuso tra parentesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5496">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5497">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5498">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5498">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5499">1-2 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5499">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5500">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5500">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5501">L'ultimo carattere (qualsiasi cifra o la lettera A), è rappresentato dal numero di controllo. Facoltativamente, può essere racchiuso tra parentesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5501">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5502">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5503">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5503">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5504">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5505">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5505">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5506">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5506">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5507">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_hong_kong_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5507">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5508">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5508">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5509">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5509">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5510">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5510">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5511">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5511">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5551">Numero di patente di guida ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5551">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5552">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5553">Due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5553">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5554">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5555">Due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5555">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5556">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5556">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5557">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5557">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5558">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5559">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5559">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5560">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5561">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5562">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5562">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5563">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5563">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5688">Numero di identificazione personale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5688">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5689">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5690">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5691">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5692">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5693">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5694">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5695">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5696">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5696">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5697">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5698">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5699">Una cifra che corrisponde al sesso (1-maschile, 2-femminile, altri numeri sono possibili anche per i cittadini nati prima del 1900 o i cittadini con doppia cittadinanza)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5699">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5700">Sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5701">Tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5702">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5702">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5703">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5704">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5705">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5706">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5707">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5708">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5709">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5710">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5717">ig.</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5721">Numero di passaporto ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5722">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5723">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5724">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5725">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5726">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5727">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5728">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5729">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5730">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5731">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5732">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5733">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5734">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5735">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5755">Codice di previdenza sociale ungherese (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5756">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5757">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5758">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5759">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5760">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5761">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5762">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5763">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5764">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5765">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5766">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5767">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5787">Numero di identificazione fiscale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5788">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5789">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5790">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5791">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5792">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5793">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5794">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5795">10 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5796">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5797">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5798">Una cifra che deve essere "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5799">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5800">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5801">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5802">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5803">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5804">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5805">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5806">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5807">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5808">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5834">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Ungheria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5835">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5836">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5837">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5838">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5839">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5840">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5841">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5842">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5843">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5844">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5845">due lettere - HU o hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5846">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5847">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5848">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5849">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5850">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5851">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5852">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5853">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5854">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5855">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5869">India - Numero di account permanente (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5870">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5871">10 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5872">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5873">10 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5874">Tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5875">Lettera in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5876">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5877">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5878">Una lettera che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5879">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5880">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5881">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5882">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5883">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5884">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_permanent_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5885">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5886">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5891">India - Numero di identificazione univoca (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5892">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5893">12 cifre contenenti spazi o trattini facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5894">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5895">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5896">Una cifra che non è 0 o 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5897">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5898">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5899">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5900">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5901">La cifra finale, che è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5902">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5903">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5904">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5905">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5906">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5907">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_aadhar da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5908">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5909">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5910">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5911">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5912">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5912">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5914">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5914">aadhaar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5916">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5916">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5917">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5917">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5918">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5918">आधार</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5920">Numero della carta di identità indonesiana (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5921">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5922">16 cifre contenenti punti facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5923">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5924">16 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5925">Codice provincia a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5926">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5927">Codice città o area a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5928">Codice sotto-distretto a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5929">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5930">Sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5931">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5932">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5933">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5934">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5935">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5936">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5937">L'espressione regolare Regex_indonesia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5938">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_indonesia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5944">Numero di conto bancario internazionale (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5945">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5946">Codice paese (due lettere) più cifre di controllo (due cifre) più numero bban (fino a 30 caratteri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5947">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5948">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5949">Codice paese a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5950">Due cifre di controllo (seguite da uno spazio facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5951">1-7 gruppi di quattro lettere o cifre (possono essere separati da spazi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5952">1-3 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5953">Il formato per ogni paese è leggermente diverso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5953">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5954">Il tipo di informazioni riservate IBAN riguarda questi 60 paesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5954">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5956">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5957">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5957">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5958">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5959">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5959">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5960">La funzione Func_iban restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5960">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5961">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5961">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
