## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5964">Classificazione internazionale delle malattie (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5964">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5965">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5965">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5966">Dizionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5966">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5967">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5967">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5968">Parola chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5968">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5969">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5970">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5970">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5971">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5972">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5972">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5973">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_updated parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5973">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5974">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_codes da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5974">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5975">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5975">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5976">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_ viene aggiornata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5976">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-5977">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5977">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5978">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_10_updated parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, decima revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-10-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5978">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5979">Questo tipo cerca solo il termine e non i codici di assicurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5979">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5980">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_10_codes parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, decima revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-10-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5980">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5981">Questo tipo cerca solo i codici di assicurazione, non la descrizione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5981">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5990">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-5996">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_9_updated parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, nona revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-9-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5996">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-5997">Questo tipo cerca solo il termine e non i codici di assicurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-5997">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6000">Indirizzo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6000">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6001">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6001">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6002">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6002">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6003">Modello complesso che rappresenta le versioni formattate (punti) e non formattate (senza punti) degli indirizzi IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6003">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6004">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6004">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6005">Modello complesso che rappresenta i numeri IPv6 formattati (che includono i due punti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6005">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6006">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6006">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6007">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6008">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6008">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6009">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6010">Per IPv6, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6010">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6011">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6011">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6012">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6012">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6013">Per IPv4, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6013">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6014">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv4_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6014">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6015">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6015">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6016">Per IPv6, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6016">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6017">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6017">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6018">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6018">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6026">Numero di patente di guida in Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6026">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6027">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6027">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6028">Sei cifre seguite da quattro lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6028">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6029">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6029">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6030">Sei cifre e quattro lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6030">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6031">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6031">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6032">Quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6032">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6033">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6034">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6034">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6035">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6036">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6037">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6037">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6038">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6038">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6162">Numero di passaporto dell'Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6162">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6163">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6164">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6164">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6165">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6166">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6166">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6167">Due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6167">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6168">Sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6168">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6169">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6170">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6171">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6172">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6173">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6174">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6175">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 01 BEA/MAGGIO 1988) o viene trovata una parola chiave da `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6175">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6176">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6177">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6177">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6178">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6202">Numero del servizio pubblico personale (PPS) dell'Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6202">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6203">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6204">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6204">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6205">sette cifre seguite da 1-2 lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6205">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6206">Nuovo formato (1 gennaio 2013 e dopo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6206">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6207">sette cifre seguite da due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6207">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6208">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6209">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6209">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6210">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6210">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6211">da una a due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6211">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6212">Nuovo formato (1 gennaio 2013 e dopo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6212">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6213">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6213">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6214">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6214">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6215">Lettera facoltativa nell'intervallo A-I o "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6215">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6217">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6218">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6219">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6220">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6220">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6221">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6221">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6222">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6223">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6223">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6224">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6224">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6225">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6270">Numero di conto corrente bancario Israele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6270">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6271">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6272">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6272">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6273">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6274">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6274">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6275">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6275">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6276">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6276">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6277">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6277">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6278">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6278">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6279">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6279">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6280">Non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6280">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6281">13 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6281">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6282">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6283">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6284">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6285">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6285">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6286">L'espressione regolare Regex_israel_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6286">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6287">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_israel_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6287">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6290">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6290">Bank Account Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6292">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6292">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6293">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6293">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6294">Numero di identificazione nazionale Israele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6294">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6295">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6296">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6296">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6297">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6298">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6298">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6299">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6300">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6300">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6301">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6302">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6302">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6303">La funzione Func_israeli_national_id_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6303">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6304">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Israel_National_ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6304">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6305">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6324">Numero di patente di guida italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6324">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6325">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6325">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6326">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6327">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6327">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6328">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6329">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6329">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6330">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6330">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6331">la lettera "A" o "V" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6331">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6332">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6332">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6333">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6333">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6334">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6335">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6335">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6336">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6337">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6338">L'espressione `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6338">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6339">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6339">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6466">Codice fiscale italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6466">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6467">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6467">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6468">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6468">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6469">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6469">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6470">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6470">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6471">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6471">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6472">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6472">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6473">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6474">una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6474">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6475">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6476">Una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6476">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6477">tre lettere che corrispondono alle prime tre consonanti nel nome della famiglia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6477">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6478">tre lettere che corrispondono alla prima, alla terza e alla quarta consonanti nel nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6478">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6479">due cifre che corrispondono alle ultime cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6479">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6480">una lettera che corrisponde alla lettera del mese di nascita: le lettere vengono utilizzate in ordine alfabetico, ma vengono utilizzate solo le lettere da A a E, H, L, M, P, R a T (quindi, gennaio è A e ottobre è R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6480">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6481">due cifre che corrispondono al giorno del mese di nascita: per distinguere i sessi, vengono aggiunti 40 al giorno di nascita per le donne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6481">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6482">quattro cifre che corrispondono al codice di area specifico del comune in cui è nata la persona (i codici a livello nazionale vengono utilizzati per i paesi esterni)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6482">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6483">una cifra di parità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6483">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6484">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6485">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6485">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6486">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6487">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6488">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6488">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6489">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6489">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6490">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6491">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6491">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6526">Numero di passaporto italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6526">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6527">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6528">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6528">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6529">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6530">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6530">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6531">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6531">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6532">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6532">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6533">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6534">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6534">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6535">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6536">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6537">L'espressione  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6537">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6538">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6538">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6539">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6539">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6540">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6540">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6541">L'espressione  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6541">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6542">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6542">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6566">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6566">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6567">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6567">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6568">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6568">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6569">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6569">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6570">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6570">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6571">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6571">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6572">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6572">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6573">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6574">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6574">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6575">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6576">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri con delimitatori facoltativi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6576">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6577">I o i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6577">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6578">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6578">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6579">spazio facoltativo, punto, trattino o virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6579">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6580">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6580">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6581">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6582">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6582">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6583">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6584">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6584">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6585">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6585">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6586">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6586">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6587">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6587">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6588">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6588">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6596">Numero di conto corrente bancario giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6596">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6597">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6598">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6598">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6599">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6599">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6600">numero di conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6600">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6601">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6601">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6602">codice filiale del conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6602">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6603">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6603">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6604">uno spazio o un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6604">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6605">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6605">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6606">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6607">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6608">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6609">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6609">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6610">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6610">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6611">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6612">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6612">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6613">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6613">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6614">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6614">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6615">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6616">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6616">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6617">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6617">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">

          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />

            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>

    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6712">Giappone Il mio numero - Corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6712">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6713">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6713">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6714">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6714">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6715">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6715">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6716">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6716">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6717">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6717">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6718">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6718">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6719">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6720">Numero a 13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6720">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6721">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6722">Numero a 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6722">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6723">una cifra da una a nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6723">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6724">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6724">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6725">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6726">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6727">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6728">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6729">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6729">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6730">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6730">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6731">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6731">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6732">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6732">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6746">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6746">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6747">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6747">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6748">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6748">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6749">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6749">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6750">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6750">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6751">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6751">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6752">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6752">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6754">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6755">Numero a 12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6755">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6756">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6756">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6757">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6757">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6758">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6758">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6759">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6759">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6760">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6760">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6761">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6762">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6762">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6763">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6764">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6765">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_personal trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6765">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6766">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6766">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6767">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6768">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_personal trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6768">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6789">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6789">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6790">La funzione Func_jp_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6790">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6791">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6791">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml

</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6808">Numero di carta di residenza giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6808">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6809">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6810">12 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6810">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6811">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6812">12 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6812">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6813">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6813">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6814">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6814">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6815">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6815">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6816">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6817">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6818">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6819">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6819">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6820">L'espressione regolare Regex_jp_residence_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6820">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6821">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_jp_residence_card_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6821">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6838">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6838">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6853">Giappone - Numero di previdenza sociale (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6853">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6854">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6855">7-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6855">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6856">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6857">7-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6857">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6858">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6858">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6859">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6859">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6860">sei cifre OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6860">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6861">7-12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6861">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6862">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6862">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6863">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6863">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6864">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6864">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6865">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6865">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6866">La funzione Func_jp_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6866">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6867">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6867">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6868">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6868">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6869">La funzione Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6869">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6870">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6870">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6891">Numero di patente lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6891">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6892">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6893">tre lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6893">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6894">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6895">tre lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6895">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6896">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6896">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6897">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6897">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6898">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6899">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6899">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-6900">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-6901">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6901">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6902">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6902">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-6903">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-6903">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
