## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7028">Codice personale Lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7028">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7029">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7030">11 cifre e un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7030">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7031">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7032">Formato precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7032">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7033">11 cifre e un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7033">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7034">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7034">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7035">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7035">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7036">una cifra che corrisponde al secolo di nascita ("0" per il 19° secolo, "1" per il 20° secolo e "2" per il 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7036">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7037">quattro cifre generate in modo casuale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7037">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7038">Nuovo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7038">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7039">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7039">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7040">Due cifre "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7040">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7041">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7041">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7042">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7043">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7043">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7044">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7045">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7045">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7046">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7046">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7047">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7047">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7048">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7048">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7049">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7049">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7112">Numero di passaporto lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7112">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7113">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7114">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7114">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7115">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7116">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7116">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7117">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7117">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7118">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7118">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7119">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7120">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7121">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7122">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7123">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7123">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7124">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7125">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7125">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7126">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7126">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7127">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7127">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7128">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7151">Numero di patente di guida lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7151">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7152">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7153">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7153">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7154">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7155">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7155">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7156">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7157">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7157">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7158">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7159">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7159">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7160">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7160">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7161">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7161">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7286">Codice personale Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7286">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7287">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7287">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7288">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7288">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7289">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7289">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7290">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7290">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7291">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7291">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7292">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7292">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7293">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7294">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7294">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7295">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7296">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7296">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7297">una cifra (da 1 a 6) che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita della persona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7297">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7298">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7298">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7299">tre cifre che corrispondono al numero seriale della data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7299">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7300">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7300">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7301">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7302">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7302">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7303">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7304">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7305">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7305">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7306">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7306">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7307">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7308">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7308">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7343">Numero di passaporto lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7343">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7344">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7345">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7345">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7346">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7347">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7347">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7348">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7349">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7349">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7350">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7351">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7351">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7352">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7352">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7353">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7353">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7354">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7354">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7355">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7356">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7356">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7357">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7357">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7377">Numero di patente di guida di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7377">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7378">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7379">sei cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7379">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7380">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7381">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7381">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7382">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7383">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7383">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7384">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7385">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7385">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7386">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7386">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7387">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7387">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7511">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Lussemburgo (persone fisiche)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7511">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7512">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7512">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7513">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7513">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7514">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7514">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7515">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7515">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7516">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7516">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7517">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7517">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7518">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7519">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7519">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7520">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7521">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7521">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7522">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7522">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7523">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7523">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7524">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7525">sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7525">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7526">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7527">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7527">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7528">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7528">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7529">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7529">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7530">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7530">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7531">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7531">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7554">Numero di passaporto di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7554">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7555">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7556">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7556">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7557">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7558">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7558">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7559">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7560">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7560">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7561">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7562">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7562">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7563">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7563">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7564">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7564">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7565">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7565">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7566">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7566">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7567">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7567">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7568">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7568">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7600">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Luxemburg (persone non naturali)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7600">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7601">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7602">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7602">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7603">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7604">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7604">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7605">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7606">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7606">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7607">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7607">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7608">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7608">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7609">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7609">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7610">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7610">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7611">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7611">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7612">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7612">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7613">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7614">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7615">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7616">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7616">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7617">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7617">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7618">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7618">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7619">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7620">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7620">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7660">Numero di carta di identità malese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7660">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7661">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7662">12 cifre contenenti lineette facoltative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7662">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7663">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7664">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7664">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7665">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7665">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7666">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7666">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7667">Codice luogo di nascita a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7667">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7668">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7668">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7669">tre cifre casuali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7669">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7670">codice di genere a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7670">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7671">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7672">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7673">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7674">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7675">L'espressione regolare Regex_malaysia_id_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7675">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7676">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7676">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7703">Numero di patente di guida di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7703">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7704">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7705">Combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7705">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7706">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7707">combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7707">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7708">due caratteri (cifre o lettere, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7708">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7709">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7709">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7710">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7710">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7711">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7711">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7712">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7712">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7713">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7714">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7714">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7715">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7716">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7716">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7717">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7717">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7718">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7718">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7842">Numero di carta d'identità di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7842">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7843">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7843">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7844">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7844">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7845">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7845">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7846">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7846">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7847">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7847">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7848">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7848">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7849">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7849">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7850">sette cifre seguite da una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7850">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7851">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7851">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7852">sette cifre seguite da una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7852">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7853">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7853">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7854">una lettera in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7854">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7855">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7856">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7856">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7857">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7858">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7859">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7859">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7860">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7860">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7861">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7861">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7862">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7862">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7879">Numero di passaporto di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7879">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7880">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7881">sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7881">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7882">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7883">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7883">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7884">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7885">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7886">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7887">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7888">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7888">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7889">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7890">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7890">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7891">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7891">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7892">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7892">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7893">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7893">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7913">Numero di identificazione fiscale di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7913">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7914">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7915">Per i cittadini maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7915">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7916">sette cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7916">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7917">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7917">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7918">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7918">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7919">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7920">Nazionali maltesi: sette cifre e una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7920">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7921">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7921">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7922">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7922">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7923">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7923">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7924">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7924">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7925">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7926">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7926">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7927">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7928">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7929">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7929">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7930">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7930">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7931">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7931">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7932">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7932">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7965">Carta MBI (Medicare Beneficiary Identifier)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7965">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7966">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7967">formato alfanumerico di undici caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7967">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7968">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7968">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7969">una cifra compresa tra 1 e 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7969">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7970">una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7970">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7971">una cifra o una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7971">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7972">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7972">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7973">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7973">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7974">una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7974">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7975">una cifra o una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7975">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7976">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7976">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7977">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7977">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7978">due lettere escluse S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7978">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7979">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7979">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7980">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7981">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7981">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7982">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7983">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7984">L'espressione  `Regex_mbi_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7984">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7985">Viene trovata una parola  `Keyword_mbi_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7985">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7986">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7987">L'espressione  `Regex_mbi_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7987">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7988">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7988">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7989">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7989">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7990">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7990">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7991">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7991">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7992">medicare beneficiario #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7992">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7993">identificatore del beneficiario medicare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7993">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7994">medicare beneficiario no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7994">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7995">medicare numero beneficiario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7995">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-7996">medicare beneficiario #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7996">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7997">Codice CURP (Unique Population Registry Code) del Messico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7997">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-7998">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-7999">Motivo alfanumerico a 18 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-7999">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8000">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8000">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8001">quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8001">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8002">sei cifre che indicano una data valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8002">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8003">una lettera - H/h o M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8003">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8004">due lettere che indicano un codice di stato messicano valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8004">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8005">tre lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8005">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8006">una lettera o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8006">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8007">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8007">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8008">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8009">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8009">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8010">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8011">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8011">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8012">La funzione  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8012">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8013">Viene trovata una parola  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8013">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8014">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8014">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8015">La funzione  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8015">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8036">Numero BSN (Netherlands citizen's service)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8036">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8037">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8038">otto o nove cifre contenenti spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8038">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8039">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8040">otto-nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8040">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8041">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8041">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8042">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8042">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8043">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8043">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8044">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8044">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8045">due-tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8045">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8046">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8047">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8047">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8048">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8049">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8050">La funzione Func_netherlands_bsn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8050">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8051">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_netherlands_bsn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8051">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8052">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8052">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
