## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8076">Numero di patente olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8076">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8077">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8078">dieci cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8078">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8079">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8080">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8080">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8081">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8082">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8083">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8084">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8084">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8085">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8085">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8086">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8086">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8214">Numero di passaporto olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8214">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8215">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8216">nove lettere o cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8216">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8217">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8218">nove lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8218">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8219">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8220">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8220">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8221">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8222">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8223">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8223">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8224">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8225">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8225">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8226">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8227">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8227">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8228">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8246">Numero di identificazione fiscale Paesi Bassi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8246">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8247">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8247">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8248">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8248">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8249">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8249">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8250">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8250">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8251">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8251">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8252">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8252">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8253">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8254">nove cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8254">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8255">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8256">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8256">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8257">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8258">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8258">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8259">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8260">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8260">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8261">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8261">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8263">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8263">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8264">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8264">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8302">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dei Paesi Bassi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8302">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8303">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8303">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8304">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8304">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8305">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8305">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8306">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8306">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8307">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8307">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8308">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8308">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8309">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8310">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8310">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8311">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8312">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8312">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8313">N o n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8313">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8314">L o l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8314">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8315">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8315">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8316">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8316">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8317">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8317">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8318">B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8318">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8319">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8319">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8320">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8321">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8321">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8322">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8323">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8323">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8324">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8324">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8325">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8325">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8326">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8326">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8327">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8327">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8336">Numero di conto corrente bancario della Nuova Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8336">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8337">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8338">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8339">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8340">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8341">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8342">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8343">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8344">Formato da 14 a 16 cifre con delimitatore facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8344">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8345">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8346">Motivo da 14 a 16 cifre con delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8346">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8347">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8347">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8348">un trattino o uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8348">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8349">da tre a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8349">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8350">un trattino o uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8350">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8351">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8351">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8352">un trattino o uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8352">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8353">da due a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8353">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8354">un trattino o uno spazio delle opzioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8354">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8355">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8356">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8356">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8357">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8358">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8358">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8359">La funzione Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8359">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8360">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8360">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8361">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8362">La funzione Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8362">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8370">Numero di patente di guida neozelandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8370">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8371">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8371">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8372">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8372">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8373">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8373">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8374">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8374">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8375">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8375">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8376">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8376">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8377">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8378">schema alfanumerico a otto caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8378">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8379">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8380">schema alfanumerico a otto caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8380">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8381">due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8381">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8382">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8382">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8383">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8384">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8384">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8385">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8386">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8387">La funzione Func_newzealand_driver_license_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8387">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8388">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8388">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8389">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8389">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8390">La funzione Func_newzealand_driver_license_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8390">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8457">New Zealand inland revenue number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8457">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8458">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8458">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8459">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8459">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8460">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8460">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8461">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8461">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8462">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8462">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8463">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8463">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8464">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8465">otto o nove cifre con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8465">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8466">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8467">otto o nove cifre con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8467">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8468">due o tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8468">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8469">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8469">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8470">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8470">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8471">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8471">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8472">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8472">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8473">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8474">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8474">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8475">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8476">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8477">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8477">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8478">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8478">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8479">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8480">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8480">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8489">Numero del ministero della sanità della Nuova Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8489">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8490">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8491">tre lettere, uno spazio (facoltativo) e quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8491">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8492">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8492">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8493">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) tranne "I" e "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8493">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8494">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8494">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8495">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8495">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8496">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8497">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8497">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8498">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8499">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8499">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8500">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8500">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8501">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_nz_terms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8501">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8502">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8502">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8503">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8504">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8504">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8505">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8505">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8519">Numero di previdenza sociale neozelandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8519">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8520">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8520">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8521">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8521">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8522">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8522">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8523">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8523">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8524">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8524">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8525">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8525">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8526">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8526">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8527">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8527">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8528">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8528">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8529">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8529">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8530">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8531">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8531">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8532">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8532">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8533">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8533">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8534">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8534">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8535">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8535">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8536">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8536">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8537">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8537">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8538">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8538">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8539">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8539">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8540">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8540">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8541">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8541">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8542">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8542">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8550">Numero di identificazione norvegia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8550">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8551">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8552">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8552">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8553">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8554">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8554">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8555">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8555">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8556">numero individuale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8556">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8557">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8557">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8558">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8559">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8559">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8560">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8561">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8561">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8562">La funzione Func_norway_id_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8562">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8563">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_norway_id_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8563">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8564">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8564">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8565">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8565">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8566">La funzione Func_norway_id_numbe trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8566">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8567">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8567">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8576">Numero di identificazione multivalore unificato delle Filippine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8576">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8577">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8578">12 cifre separate da dei segni meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8578">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8579">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8580">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8580">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8581">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8581">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8582">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8582">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8583">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8583">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8584">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8584">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8585">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8585">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8586">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8586">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8587">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8587">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8588">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8588">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8589">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8589">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8590">L'espressione regolare Regex_philippines_unified_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8590">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8591">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_philippines_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8591">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8592">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8592">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8593">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8593">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8594">ID multifunzione unificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8594">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8595">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8595">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8596">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8596">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8597">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8597">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8598">Numero di patente di guida polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8598">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8599">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8600">14 cifre contenenti due barre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8600">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8601">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8602">14 cifre e due barre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8602">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8603">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8603">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8604">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8604">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8605">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8606">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8606">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8607">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8607">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8608">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8609">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8609">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8610">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8611">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8611">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8612">L'espressione  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8612">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8613">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8613">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8737">Carta di identità polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8737">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8738">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8739">tre lettere e sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8739">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8740">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8741">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8741">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8742">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8743">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8743">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8744">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8745">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8745">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8746">La funzione Func_polish_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8746">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8747">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8747">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8748">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8748">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8759">ID nazionale Polonia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8759">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8760">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8761">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8761">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8762">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8762">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8763">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita nel formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8763">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8764">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8764">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8765">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8765">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8766">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8767">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8767">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8768">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8769">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8770">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8770">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8771">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_pesel_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8771">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8772">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8773">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8773">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8774">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8774">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8775">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8787">Numero di passaporto polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8787">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8788">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8788">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8789">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8789">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8790">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8791">due lettere e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8791">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8792">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8793">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8793">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8794">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8795">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8795">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8796">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8797">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8797">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8798">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8798">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8799">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8799">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8800">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8800">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8801">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8801">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8802">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8802">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8803">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8803">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8804">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8804">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8805">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8805">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8806">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8807">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8807">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8808">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8834">Numero REGON Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8834">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8835">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8836">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8837">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8838">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8839">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8840">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8841">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8842">Numero a 9 o 14 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8842">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8843">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8844">numero a nove cifre o a 14 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8844">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8845">nove cifre o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8845">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8846">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8846">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8847">trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8847">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8848">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8848">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8849">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8850">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8850">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8851">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8852">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8852">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8853">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8853">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8854">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_polish_regon_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8854">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8855">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8855">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8856">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8856">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8873">Numero di identificazione fiscale polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8873">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8874">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8874">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8875">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8875">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8876">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8876">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8877">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8877">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8878">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8878">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8879">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8879">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8880">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8881">11 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8881">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8882">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8883">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8883">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8884">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8885">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8885">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8886">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8887">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8888">La funzione  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8888">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8889">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8919">Numero di carta di cittadinanza portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8919">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8920">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8921">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8921">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8922">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8923">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8923">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8924">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8924">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8925">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8925">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8926">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8926">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8927">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8927">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8928">L'espressione regolare Regex_portugal_citizen_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8928">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8929">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_portugal_citizen_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8929">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
