## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8949">Numero di patente di guida portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8949">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8950">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8951">due modelli - due lettere seguite da 5-8 cifre con caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8951">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8952">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8953">Modello 1: due lettere seguite da 5/6 con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8953">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8954">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8954">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8955">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8955">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8956">Cinque o sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8956">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8957">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8957">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8958">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8958">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8959">Modello 2: una lettera seguita da 6/8 cifre con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8959">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8960">Una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8960">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8961">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8961">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8962">Sei o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8962">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8963">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8963">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8964">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8964">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8965">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8966">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-8967">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-8968">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8968">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8969">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8969">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-8970">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-8970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9102">Numero di passaporto portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9102">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9103">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9104">una lettera seguita da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9104">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9105">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9106">una lettera seguita da sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9106">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9107">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9107">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9108">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9108">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9109">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9110">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9110">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9111">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9112">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9112">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9113">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9113">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9114">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9114">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9115">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9115">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9116">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9116">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9117">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9117">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9118">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9118">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9145">Numero di identificazione fiscale del Portogallo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9145">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9146">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9147">nove cifre con spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9147">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9148">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9148">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9149">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9149">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9150">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9150">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9151">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9152">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9152">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9153">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9153">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9154">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9155">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9155">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9156">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9157">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9157">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9158">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9158">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9159">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9159">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9160">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9160">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9161">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9161">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9186">Numero di patente di guida romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9186">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9187">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9188">un carattere seguito da otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9188">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9189">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9190">un carattere seguito da otto cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9190">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9191">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9191">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9192">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9192">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9193">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9194">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9194">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9195">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9196">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9196">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9197">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9197">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9198">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9198">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9326">Codice numerico personale Romania (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9326">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9327">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9327">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9328">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9328">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9329">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9329">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9330">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9330">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9331">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9331">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9332">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9332">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9333">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9334">13 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9334">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9335">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9335">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9336">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9336">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9337">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9337">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9338">due cifre, che possono essere 01-52 o 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9338">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9339">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9339">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9340">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9341">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9341">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9342">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9343">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9343">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9344">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9344">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9345">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9345">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9346">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9346">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9347">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9347">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9398">Numero di passaporto romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9398">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9399">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9400">otto o nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9400">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9401">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9402">otto o nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9402">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9403">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9404">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9404">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9405">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9406">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9406">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9407">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9407">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9408">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9408">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9409">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio- 01 FEB/FEB 10) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9409">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9410">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9410">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9411">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9411">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9412">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9412">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9430">Russia - Numero di passaporto nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9430">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9431">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9432">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9433">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9434">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9434">information governance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9436">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9504">Arabia Saudita - Identificativo nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9504">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9505">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9506">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9506">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9507">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9508">10 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9508">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9509">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9510">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9511">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9512">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9512">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9513">L'espressione regolare Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9513">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9514">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9514">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9521">Numero NRIC (National Registration Identity Card) di Singapore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9521">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9522">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9523">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9523">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9524">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9524">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9525">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9525">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9526">la lettera "F", "G", "S" o "T" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9526">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9527">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9527">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9528">una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9528">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9529">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9530">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9531">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9532">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9533">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9533">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9534">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_singapore_nric.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9534">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9535">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9536">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9537">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9537">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9538">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9539">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9539">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9540">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9540">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9541">Carta di identità di registrazione nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9541">National Registration Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9543">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9543">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9544">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9544">IC</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9549">Numero di patente di guida slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9549">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9550">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9551">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9551">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9552">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9553">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9553">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9554">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9554">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9555">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9555">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9556">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9557">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9557">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9558">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9559">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9559">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9560">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9560">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9561">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9561">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9687">Numero personale Slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9687">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9688">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9689">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9690">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9691">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9692">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9693">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9694">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9695">nove o dieci cifre contenenti barra rovesciata facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9695">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9696">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9696">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9697">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9697">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9698">barra facoltativa (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9698">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9699">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9699">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9700">una cifra di controllo facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9700">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9701">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9702">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9703">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9704">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9705">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9705">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9706">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9706">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9707">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9707">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9708">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9708">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9755">Numero di passaporto slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9755">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9756">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9757">una cifra o una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9757">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9758">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9759">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9759">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9760">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9761">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9761">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9762">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9763">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9764">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9764">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9765">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9765">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9766">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9766">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9767">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9768">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9768">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9769">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9769">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9791">Numero di patente di guida slovena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9791">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9792">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9793">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9793">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9794">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9795">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9795">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9796">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9797">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9797">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9798">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9799">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9799">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9800">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9800">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9801">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9801">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9928">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9928">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9929">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9929">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9930">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9930">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9931">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9931">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9932">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9932">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9933">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9933">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9934">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9934">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9935">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9936">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9936">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9937">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9938">13 cifre nel modello specificato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9938">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9939">sette cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMLLL), dove "LLL" corrisponde alle ultime tre cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9939">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9940">due cifre che corrispondono all'area di nascita "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9940">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9941">tre cifre che corrispondono a una combinazione di sesso e numero di serie per le persone nate nello stesso giorno (000-499 per gli uomini e 500-999 per le donne)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9941">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9942">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9942">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9943">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9944">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9944">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9945">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9946">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9946">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9947">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9947">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9948">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9948">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9949">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9950">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9950">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9978">Numero di passaporto slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9978">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9979">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9979">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9980">due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9980">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9981">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9981">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9982">due lettere seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9982">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9983">la lettera "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9983">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9984">una lettera maiuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9984">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9985">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9985">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9986">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9987">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-9988">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9989">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9989">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9990">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9990">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9991">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9991">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9992">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9992">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-9993">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9994">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9994">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-9995">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-9995">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10019">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10019">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10020">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10020">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10021">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10021">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10022">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10022">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10023">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10023">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10024">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10024">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10025">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10026">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10026">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10027">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10027">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10028">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10028">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10029">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10029">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10030">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10030">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10031">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10032">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10033">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10034">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10034">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10035">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10035">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10036">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10036">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10037">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10037">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10038">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10038">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10062">Numero di identificazione sudafricano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10062">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10063">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10064">13 cifre che possono contenere spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10064">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10065">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10066">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10066">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10067">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10067">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10068">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10068">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10069">indicatore di cittadinanza a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10069">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10070">la cifra "8" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10070">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10071">una cifra, ovvero una cifra di checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10071">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10072">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10073">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10073">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10074">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10075">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10075">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10076">La funzione Func_south_africa_identification_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10076">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10077">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_south_africa_identification_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10077">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10078">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10078">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10079">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10079">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10080">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10080">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>
