## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10084">South Korea resident registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10084">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10085">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10086">13 cifre contenenti un segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10086">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10087">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10088">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10088">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10089">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10089">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10090">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10090">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10091">una cifra determinata dal secolo e dal sesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10091">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10092">Codice paese di nascita a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10092">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10093">una cifra utilizzata per distinguere le persone per le quali i numeri precedenti sono identici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10093">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10094">una cifra di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10094">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10095">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10096">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10096">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10097">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10098">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10098">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10099">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10099">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10100">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_south_korea_resident_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10100">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10101">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10101">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10102">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10102">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10103">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10103">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10104">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10105">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10105">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10106">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10106">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10107">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10107">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10108">Numero di registrazione del cittadino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10108">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10109">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10109">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10110">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10110">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10111">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10111">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10112">Numero di patente di guida in Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10112">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10113">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10114">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10114">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10115">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10116">otto cifre seguite da un carattere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10116">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10117">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10117">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10118">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10118">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10119">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10120">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10120">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10121">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10122">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10123">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10123">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10124">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10125">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10126">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10126">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10265">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10266">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10267">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10268">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10268">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10269">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10270">sette cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10270">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10271">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10271">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10272">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10272">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10273">una lettera di controllo (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10273">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10274">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10275">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10276">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10277">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10277">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10278">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10278">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10279">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10279">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10280">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10280">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10281">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10281">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10305">Numero di passaporto spagnolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10305">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10306">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10307">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10307">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10308">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10309">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10309">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10310">due cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10310">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10311">una cifra o una lettera (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10311">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10312">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10312">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10313">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10314">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10314">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10315">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10316">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10316">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10317">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10317">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10318">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10318">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10319">L'espressione `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG-MM-AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10319">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10320">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10321">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10321">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10322">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10322">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10351">Spagna - Numero di previdenza sociale (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10351">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10352">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10353">11-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10353">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10354">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10355">11-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10355">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10356">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10356">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10357">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10357">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10358">da sette a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10358">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10359">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10359">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10360">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10360">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10361">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10362">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10363">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10364">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10365">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10365">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10366">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10366">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10367">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10367">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10368">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10368">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10369">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10369">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10370">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10379">Numero di identificazione fiscale spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10379">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10380">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10380">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10381">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10381">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10382">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10382">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10383">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10383">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10384">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10384">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10385">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10385">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10386">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10387">sette o otto cifre e una o due lettere nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10387">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10388">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10389">Spagnolo Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10389">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10390">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10390">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10391">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10392">Spagnoli non residenti senza carta di identità nazionale di Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10392">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10393">una lettera maiuscola "L" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10393">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10394">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10395">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10396">Spagnoli residenti di età inferiore a 14 anni senza carta d'identità nazionale spagna:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10396">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10397">una lettera maiuscola "K" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10397">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10398">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10398">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10399">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10399">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10400">Stranieri con numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10400">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10401">una lettera maiuscola che è "X", "Y" o "Z" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10401">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10402">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10402">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10403">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10403">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10404">Stranieri senza numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10404">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10405">una lettera maiuscola che è "M" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10405">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10406">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10406">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10407">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10407">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10408">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10409">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10409">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10410">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10411">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10412">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10412">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10413">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10413">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10414">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10414">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10415">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10415">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10446">SQL Server stringa di connessione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10446">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10447">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10448">La stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10448">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10449">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10449">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10450">la stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10450">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10451">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10451">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10452">la stringa "Password" o "pwd" dove "pwd" non è preceduta da una lettera minuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10452">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10453">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10453">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10454">qualsiasi carattere che non sia un simbolo del dollaro ($), un simbolo di percentuale (%), un simbolo di maggiore di (>), un simbolo di simbolo (@), virgolette ("), un punto e virgola (;), una parentesi graffa sinistra([) o una parentesi quadra sinistra ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10454">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10455">qualsiasi combinazione di 7-128 caratteri che non siano un punto e virgola (;), barra (/) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10455">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10456">un punto e virgola (;) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10456">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10457">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10458">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10459">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10460">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10461">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10461">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10462">Una parola chiave CEP_GlobalFilter non viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10462">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10463">L'espressione CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10463">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10464">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10464">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10465">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10465">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10466">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10466">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10467">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10467">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10468">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10468">somepassword</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10472">Tecnicamente, questo tipo di informazioni riservate identifica queste parole chiave utilizzando un'espressione regolare e non un elenco di parole chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10472">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10473">Password o pwd seguiti da 0-2 spazi, un segno di uguale (=), 0-2 spazi e un asterisco (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10473">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10474">Password o pwd seguito da:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10474">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10476">Simbolo minore di (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10476">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10477">Qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 caratteri maiuscoli o minuscoli, cifre, asterisco (\*), trattino (-), sottolineatura (_) o spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10477">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10478">Simbolo maggiore di (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10478">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10492">Numero di patente di guida in Svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10492">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10493">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10494">dieci cifre contenenti un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10494">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10495">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10496">dieci cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10496">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10497">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10497">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10498">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10498">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10499">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10499">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10500">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10501">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10502">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10503">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10504">L'espressione  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10504">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10505">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10505">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10638">Svezia - ID nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10638">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10639">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10640">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10640">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10641">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10642">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10642">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10643">due cifre (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10643">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10644">Sei cifre nel formato data AAMMGG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10644">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10645">delimitatore di "-" o "+" (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10645">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10646">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10646">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10647">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10648">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10648">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10649">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10650">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10650">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10651">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10651">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10652">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10652">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10653">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10653">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10654">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10654">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10655">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10655">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10656">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10656">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10675">Svezia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10675">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10676">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10677">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10677">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10678">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10679">otto cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10679">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10680">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10681">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10682">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10683">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10684">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10684">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10685">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10685">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10686">l'espressione regolare trova una data nel formato `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (01 JAN/JAN 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10686">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10687">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10687">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10688">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10688">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10689">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10689">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10725">Numero di identificazione fiscale svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10725">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10726">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10726">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10727">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10727">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10728">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10728">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10729">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10729">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10730">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10730">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10731">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10731">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10732">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10733">10 cifre e un simbolo nel motivo specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10733">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10734">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10735">10 cifre e un simbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10735">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10736">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10736">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10737">segno più o meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10737">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10738">tre cifre che rendono univoco il numero di identificazione dove:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10738">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10739">per i numeri emessi prima del 1990, la settima e l'ottava cifra identificano la provincia di nascita o i nati all'estero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10739">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10740">la cifra nella nona posizione indica il sesso per dispari per il maschio o anche per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10740">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10741">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10741">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10742">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10743">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10743">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10744">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10745">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10745">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10746">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10746">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10747">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10747">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10748">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10749">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10749">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10775">Codice SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10775">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10776">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10777">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10777">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10778">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10779">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10779">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10780">Codice bancario di quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10780">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10781">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10781">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10782">4-28 lettere o cifre (BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10782">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10783">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10783">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10784">da una a tre lettere o cifre (resto del BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10784">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10785">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10786">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10786">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10787">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10788">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10788">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10789">L'espressione regolare Regex_swift restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10789">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10790">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_swift.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10790">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10828">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10828">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10829">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10829">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10830">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10830">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10831">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10831">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10832">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10832">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10833">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10833">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10834">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10835">Numero a 13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10835">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10836">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10837">Numero a 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10837">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10838">tre cifre - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10838">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10839">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10839">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10840">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10840">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10841">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10841">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10842">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10842">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10843">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10843">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10844">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10844">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10845">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10846">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10846">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10847">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10848">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10848">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10849">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10849">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10850">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10850">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10851">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10851">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10852">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10852">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10873">Taiwan - Numero di identificazione nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10873">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10874">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10874">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10875">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10875">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10876">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10876">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10877">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10877">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10878">una lettera (in inglese, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10878">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10879">la cifra "1" o "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10879">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10880">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10880">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10881">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10882">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10882">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10883">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10884">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10884">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10885">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10885">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10886">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwanese_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10886">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10887">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10887">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10888">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10888">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10889">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10889">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10890">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10890">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10907">Numero di passaporto taiwanese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10907">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10908">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10908">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10909">Numero di passaporto biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10909">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10910">numero di passaporto non biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10910">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10911">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10911">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10912">numero di passaporto biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10912">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10913">il carattere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10913">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10914">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10914">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10915">numero di passaporto non biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10915">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10916">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10916">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10917">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10918">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10919">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10920">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10921">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_passport trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10921">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10922">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_taiwan_passport da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10922">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10933">Numero di certificato residente a Taiwan (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10933">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10934">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10935">10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10935">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10936">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10937">10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10937">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10938">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10938">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10939">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10939">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10940">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10941">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10942">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10943">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10944">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10944">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10945">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10945">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
