## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10959">Codice di identificazione della popolazione thai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10959">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10960">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10961">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10961">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10962">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10963">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10963">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10964">la prima cifra non è zero o nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10964">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10965">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10965">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10966">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10966">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10967">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10967">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10968">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10968">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10969">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10969">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10970">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10970">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10971">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10971">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10972">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10972">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10973">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10973">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10982">Numero di identificazione nazionale turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10982">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10983">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10984">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10984">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10985">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10986">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10986">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10987">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10988">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10988">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10989">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10990">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10991">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10991">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10992">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Turkish_National_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10992">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-10993">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-10994">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10994">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-10996">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-10996">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11001">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11001">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11002">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11002">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11003">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11004">Combinazione di 18 lettere e numeri nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11004">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11005">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11006">18 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11006">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11007">Cinque lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11007">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11008">Una cifra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11008">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11009">Cinque cifre nel formato di data MMDDY per la data di nascita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11009">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11010">Il settimo carattere viene incrementato di 50 se driver è femminile. per exampe, da 51 a 62 invece che da 01 a 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11010">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11011">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11011">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11012">Cinque cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11012">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11013">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11014">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11014">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11015">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11016">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11016">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11017">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11017">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11018">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11018">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11019">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11019">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11020">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11020">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11021">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11021">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11022">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11143">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11143">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11144">numero di rullino elettorale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11144">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11145">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11146">due lettere seguite da 1-4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11146">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11147">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11148">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da 1-4 numeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11148">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11149">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11150">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11151">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11152">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11152">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11153">L'espressione regolare Regex_uk_electoral restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11153">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11154">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11154">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11155">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11155">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11157">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11157">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11158">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11158">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11159">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11159">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11160">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11160">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11161">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11161">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11162">numero del servizio sanitario nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11162">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11163">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11164">10-17 cifre separate da spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11164">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11165">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11166">10-17 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11166">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11167">3 o 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11167">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11168">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11168">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11169">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11169">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11170">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11170">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11171">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11171">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11172">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11173">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11174">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11175">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11176">La funzione Func_uk_nhs_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11176">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11177">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11177">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11178">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11178">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11179">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11179">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11180">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11180">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11181">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11181">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11199">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11199">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11200">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11200">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11201">Questa entità del tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11201">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11202">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11202">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11203">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11204">sette o nove caratteri separati da spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11204">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11205">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11206">due modelli possibili:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11206">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11207">due lettere (i VALORI NINO validi utilizzano solo determinati caratteri in questo prefisso, convalidato da questo modello, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11207">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11208">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11208">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11209">'A', 'B', 'C' o 'D' (come il prefisso, nel suffisso sono consentiti solo determinati caratteri, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11209">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11210">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11210">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11211">due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11211">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11212">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11212">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11213">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11213">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11214">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11214">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11215">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11215">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11216">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11216">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11217">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11217">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11218">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11218">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11219">"A", "B", "C" o "D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11219">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11220">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11221">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11222">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11223">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11223">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11224">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11224">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11225">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11225">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11226">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11227">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11227">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11249">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11249">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11250">Numero di riferimento fiscale univoco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11250">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11251">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11251">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11252">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11252">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11255">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11255">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11256">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11256">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11257">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11257">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11259">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11260">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11260">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11261">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11262">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11263">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11263">Definition</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11265">La funzione  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11265">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11266">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11266">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11286">Numero di conto corrente bancario statunitense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11286">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11287">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11288">6-17 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11288">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11289">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11290">6-17 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11290">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11293">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11294">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11295">L'espressione regolare Regex_usa_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11295">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11296">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11296">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11326">Numero di patente di guida statunitense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11326">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11327">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11328">Varia in base allo stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11328">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11329">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11330">dipende dallo stato, ad esempio New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11330">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11331">le nove cifre formattate come ddd ddd ddd corrisponderanno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11331">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11332">nove cifre come dddddddddd non corrispondono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11332">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11333">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11334">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11335">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11336">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11336">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11337">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11337">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11338">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11338">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11339">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11339">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11340">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11340">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11341">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11341">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11342">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11342">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11343">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11343">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11344">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11344">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11442">Numero di identificazione del singolo contribuente statunitense (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11442">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11443">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11444">nove cifre che iniziano con "9" e contengono "7" o "8" come quarta cifra, facoltativamente formattate con spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11444">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11445">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11446">formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11446">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11447">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11447">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11448">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11448">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11449">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11449">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11450">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11450">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11451">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11451">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11452">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11452">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11453">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11453">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11454">non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11454">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11455">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11455">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11456">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11456">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11457">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11457">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11458">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11458">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11459">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11460">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11460">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11461">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11462">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11462">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11463">La funzione Func_formatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11463">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11464">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11464">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11465">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11466">La funzione Func_unformatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11466">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11467">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11467">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11468">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11468">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11469">La funzione Func_formatted_itin o Func_unformatted_itin trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11469">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11484">Numero di previdenza sociale statunitense (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11484">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11485">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11486">nove cifre, che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11486">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11487">Se emesso prima della metà del 2011, un SSN ha una formattazione solida in cui alcune parti del numero devono rientrare in determinati intervalli per essere valide (ma non è presente alcun checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11487">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11488">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11489">Quattro funzioni ricercano i nomi SSN in quattro modelli diversi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11489">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11490">Func_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla 2011 formattata con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11490">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla versione 2011 non formattata come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn trova sSN post-2011 formattati con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn trova SSN post-2011 non formattati come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11494">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11495">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11495">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11496">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11497">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11497">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11498">La funzione Func_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11498">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11499">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11499">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11500">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11501">La funzione Func_unformatted_ssn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11501">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11502">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11502">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11503">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11503">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11504">La funzione Func_randomized_formatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11504">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11505">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11505">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11506">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11506">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11507">La funzione Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11507">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11508">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11508">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11509">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11509">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11510">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11510">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11511">SSA Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11511">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11512">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11512">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11513">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11513">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11514">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11514">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11515">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11515">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11516">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11516">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11517">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11517">Soc Sec</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11523">Stati Uniti / Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11523">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11524">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11524">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11525">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11526">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11526">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11527">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11528">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11528">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11529">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11530">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11530">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f639-11531">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11532">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11533">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11533">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11534">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11534">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11535">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11535">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f639-11536">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11537">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11537">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f639-11538">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f639-11538">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
